faq.title: Everything you need to know before getting started

items.question: Can I try MaLove.App for free?
items.answer: Yes. The Essentials plan is free forever and unlocks core features (guests, tasks, website). The Professional plan offers a 14-day trial with advanced integrations.

items.question: Does MaLove.App work for planners running multiple events?
items.answer: Absolutely. The multi-event dashboard lets you switch weddings, share permissions with collaborators, and automate updates with vendors for each event.

items.question: What onboarding support will I receive?
items.answer: We provide guided onboarding, a template library, and optional consulting. The Enterprise plan includes a dedicated manager and training sessions for your team.
